name: Thiago Ramalho
title: Sênior Developer
about: Experienced Full Stack Engineer with a demonstrated history of working with Software development. Skilled in Databases, Web/ Mobile Applications. Strong engineering professional with a bachelor focused in Information of Systems from IESP IESP - Instituto de Educação Superior da Paraíba. A Great team work developer always concerned about, good practices in planning, creative solution, clean code, good communication, quick learn and quick adaptability to changes. Professional with more than 10 years of experience in software development, having worked with different language as Java (2 Years), .Net (10 Years), Node.js (6 years) and many different mobile and frontend frameworks, always using his fluency in English for contacting international suppliers. Interest in Agile methodologies and practices as XP, Scrum and TDD. Try to continually improve, both in professional and personal levels, and to collaborate creatively in the projects and with the people around.
